The main objective ass feasibility measure high resolution transient elastography pathologic skin , define 3 area measure . DOC.brief_title: Transient Elastography DEdicated Cosmetology And Dermatology ( TEDECAD )
DOC.detailed_description: This diagnostic study perform two step , goal evaluate new device , call elastograph . The first pilot step 8 patient ( 4 lymphedema 4 venous insufficiency ) . The main objective ass feasibility measure high resolution transient elastography pathologic skin , define 3 area measure . The second step 136 participant ( 48 healthy volunteer , 48 venous insufficiency 40 unilateral lymphedema limb ) . The main objective quantify , high resolution transient elastography , dermal hypodermal cutaneous fibrosis limb lymphedema venous insufficiency , compare healthy skin .
